switchpromotionconte.description: To take advantage of one of these great offers, select your utility.
switchpromotionconte.fineprinttext: * Price and Visa Reward Card offers are available to new residential customers who use 1,500 Ccf per year or less, enrolling with Ohio Natural Gas between 01/02/2018 and 01/31/2018 using applicable promotion code; Visa Reward Card offer available only for such customers enrolling online at www.onlyong.com/SWITCH. ONG service is available for eligible customers participating in the Ohio choice program through their natural gas utility company. ONG prices do not include taxes or local utility charges. For more information regarding terms and conditions, call 1.800.735.0822, write to Ohio Natural Gas, P.O. Box 14657, Cleveland, OH 44114, or visit www.onlyong.com. Early termination charges apply for residential fixed price plans (12-Month plan: $150/$75, 6-Month plan: $75). Customer must have continuous active service with Ohio Natural Gas for at least 60 days to be eligible to receive the reward card. After reaching eligibility, please allow 4-6 weeks for delivery. Visa Reward Card is issued by and is the property of CenterState Bank of Florida, NA pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. Cannot be combined with any other offer.
switchpromotionconte.heading: SPECIAL BONUS: Enroll online and receive a $10 Visa® Reward Card!*
switchpromotionconte.text:
Come back to Ohio Natural Gas® for a low 6- or 12-month fixed rate that won’t change for the duration of your contract - guaranteed!

How much are you paying for natural gas?

We know you have a choice when it comes to your natural gas supplier, but when was the last time you shopped around for a better rate? Now is a great time to see what Ohio Natural Gas has to offer because we’d love to have you back as a customer. To prove it, we’ve got two great offers.

SPECIAL BONUS: Enroll online and receive a $10 Visa® Reward Card!*  

Switching back is easy.

- Locate your most recent natural gas bill.

- Identify your utility account number.

- Select one of the plan offers and enroll. 

Hurry! Offer ends {{EXPIRATIONDATE}}.
